Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) can operate with high efficiency in two ways-as fuel cells, oxidizing a fuel to produce electricity, and as electrolysis cells, electrolysing water to produce hydrogen and oxygen gases.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Ideally, SOCs should perform well, be durable and be inexpensive, but there are often competitive tensions, meaning that, for example, performance is achieved at the expense of durability.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: SOCs consist of porous electrodes-the fuel and air electrodes-separated by a dense electrolyte.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In terms of the electrodes, the greatest challenge is to deliver high, long-lasting electrocatalytic activity while ensuring cost-and time-efficient manufacture(1).
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: This has typically been achieved through lengthy and intricate ex situ procedures.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: These often require dedicated precursors and equipment(1-3); moreover, although the degradation of such electrodes associated with their reversible operation can be mitigated(4), they are susceptible to many other forms of degradation(5).
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: An alternative is to grow appropriate electrode nanoarchitectures under operationally relevant conditions, for example, via redox exsolution(6-10).
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Here we describe the growth of a finely dispersed array of anchored metal nanoparticles on an oxide electrode through electrochemical poling of a SOC at 2 volts for a few seconds.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: These electrode structures perform well as both fuel cells and electrolysis cells (for example, at 900 degrees C they deliver 2 watts per square centimetre of power in humidified hydrogen gas, and a current of 2.75 amps per square centimetre at 1.3 volts in 50% water/nitrogen gas).
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The nanostructures and corresponding electrochemical activity do not degrade in 150 hours of testing.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: These results not only prove that in operando methods can yield emergent nanomaterials, which in turn deliver exceptional performance, but also offer proof of concept that electrolysis and fuel cells can be unified in a single, high-performance, versatile and easily manufactured device.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: This opens up the possibility of simple, almost instantaneous production of highly active nanostructures for reinvigorating SOCs during operation.
Titulo: Switching on electrocatalytic activity in solid oxide cells
